name: Master of Flanking
desc: The true fear always comes from behind, and you have learned how to grasp the weaknesses of the enemy.
condition_desc: Obtain {0} [A Flaw!] for remembrance (Deal damage by backstabing at least 50 times in a single round of Spiral of Destinies).

name: Confronting the Life
desc: Fall down seven times, stand up eight!
condition_desc: Complete the Spiral of Destinies {0} time(s) without using the [Fate's Favor].

name: Rolling Stones
desc: You have a keen insight into the battlefield and have utilized the "Rolling Boulder" tactic to its fullest potential!
condition_desc: Obtain {0} [Watch Out for Boulders!] for remembrance (Push stones to deal damage to enemies at least 10 times in a single round of Spiral of Destinies).

name: Legend of Time
desc: The exciting stories you left behind and the remarkable achievements you accomplished along the way will be remembered and passed down through the ages!
condition_desc: Spent {0} weeks in [Spiral of Destinies]

name: Dear Comrades
desc: Leave no soldier behind! This is not only a principle to live by but also a result that must be achieved.
condition_desc: Obtain {0} [We'll Return Home Together!] for remembrance (Complete at least 30 battles without ally deaths in a single round of Spiral of Destinies).

name: Go to the Abyss
desc: You have a keen insight into the battlefield and are extremely skilled at using cliffs to deal with enemies.
condition_desc: Obtain {0} [Just Fall Already!] for remembrance (Inflict damage on enemies at least 15 times by pushing them off of a cliff in a single round of Spiral of Destinies).

name: Best Mercenary
desc: You've been working hard to complete every dispatch quest. Thank you for these days.
condition_desc: Obtain {0} [Indefatigable Mercenaries] for remembrance (Complete at least 40 dispatch requests in a single round of Spiral of Destinies).

name: Tempered Steel
desc: After practicing for so long, you have unknowingly become a master of omnipotence!
condition_desc: Obtain {0} [Master of Training] for remembrance (Conduct training 30 times in a single round of Spiral of Destinies).

name: Radiant Dream
desc: Peace has arrived, and at this moment, the dreams that inspired people to move forward and the humanity that overcame the darkness are shining brightly.
condition_desc: Mercenary Group Rank achieved Radiant {0} time(s)

name: Arsenal of Convallaria
desc: Your arsenal is fully stocked, providing a strong sense of security for those heading into the battlefield.
condition_desc: Obtain {0} [Armed to the Teeth] for remembrance. (Forge gear 25 times in a single round of Spiral of Destinies.)

name: Breakthrough Era
desc: The great transformation of technology comes from curiosity and the courage of unremitting development!
condition_desc: {0} Astral Tear(s) consumed.

name: Friend of Sorceress
desc: Your repeated assistance to Beryl has earned you the official designation of the "most reliable errand boy"!
condition_desc: Obtain {0} [Sorcerer's Assistant] for remembrance. (Complete Beryl's quests 20 times in a single round of Spiral of Destinies.)

name: Command to Perfection
desc: On the battlefield, every moment presents new challenges, but you have mastered the art of command and tactics to perfection, dominating the entire battlefield with your vision!
condition_desc: Obtain {0} [Miracle Command] for remembrance. (Complete at least 10 battles completely unharmed in a single round of Spiral of Destinies.)

name: Deep Pockets
desc: Money makes the world go round.
condition_desc: Obtain [Break Even] {0} times. (Obtain over 10,000 funds in a single cycle.)

name: Luxite Collector
desc: You once acquired many Luxites. Do you remember what you exchanged them all for?
condition_desc: Acquire {0} Radiant Luxite(s).

name: Time Traveler
desc: You embark on new journeys and make new friends time and time again, carrying those memories and stories in your heart.
condition_desc: Start a new Spiral of Destinies with {0} beacon(s).

name: Eventful Years
desc: Many things may change with time, but our shared experiences will always be a part of us.
condition_desc: Bid farewell to {0} different characters in the Spiral of Destinies settlement.

name: Constellation of Companions
desc: You always had companions with you on your adventures. That's why you have never known what it means to be alone.
condition_desc: Start a new Spiral of Destinies with {0} different characters.

name: Blessed by Generosity
desc: Every adventure bestows a mysterious blessing upon you, inspiring you to strive harder and make the most of them!
condition_desc: Select {0} different Tarots during divinations

name: Crystal Guardianship
desc: The power of crystals is unfathomable, so instead of trying to uncover all of its secrets, we should focus on utilizing it to its fullest potential.
condition_desc: Select {0} different Augments at the beginning.

name: The Epic Composed
desc: You have left your mark on every battlefield across the continent and every chapter of the story. You have witnessed everything there is to know about war, peace, resistance, and humanity.
condition_desc: Achieve {0} different endings

name: Blooming of Convallaria
desc: You have traversed every corner of this realm, lived through sagas sung by bards, joined ranks with dreamers in their valiant quests. Each moment you've battled and each breath you've taken have blossomed like the eternal convallaria, leaving indelible marks upon the tapestry of time.
condition_desc: Obtain {0} medal(s)
